dcterms:description: H36M records multi-view videos with 4 cameras and collects human poses using the marker-based motion capture system. It includes multiple subjects performing complex actions.
dcterms:title: H36M

dcterms:description: ZJU-MoCap records multi-view videos with 21 cameras and collects human poses using the marker-less motion capture system. It includes various sequences for evaluation.
dcterms:title: ZJU-MoCap
